#### Question 1

#### Question 3 

```{r}
head(cars)
df <- cars
Y <- df$dist
speed <- df$speed 
X <- cbind(1, speed)
b <- solve(t(X) %*% X)  %*% t(X) %*% Y ## %*% means perform matrix multiplication
print(b)

model <- lm(dist ~ speed, data= cars)
summary(model)
```
